// created by: Prashant Kumar Singh :)
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<utility>
#include<cstring>
#include<string.h>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<functional>
#include<bitset>
#include<iomanip>
#define ll long long
#define gr greater<ll>()
#define pi acos(-1.0)
#define pb push_back
#define MS0(ar) memset(ar,0,sizeof ar)
#define f first
#define s second
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define pll pair<ll,ll>
#define ind(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define inf(a) scanf("%lf",&a)
#define inl(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define ins(a) scanf("%s",a)
#define pd(a) printf("%d\n",a)
#define pl(a) printf("%lld\n",a);
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	cin.tie(0);
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
	freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
#endif
	string s;
	ll t;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--)
	{
		cin >> s;
		ll l = s.length();
		ll cnt = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
		{
			if (i == 0 && s[i] != s[i + 1])
				cnt++;
			else if (i == l - 1 && s[i] != s[i - 1])
				cnt++;
			else if (s[i] != s[i - 1] && s[i] != s[i + 1] && i >= 1 && i <= l - 2)
				cnt++;
		}
		cout << (1LL << cnt) << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
